body: #inrt.js inrt.js is a lightweight and simple class that gives you the ability to apply inertial scrolling a container. I wanted to create a inertial wrapper class that didn't require the use of external libraries such as jQuery. ##Basic Usage inrt.js is very easy to add to your page, below shows the basics.
